title: IMoveFaceFeatureData.IGetTriadRotationParameters
description: Gets the rotation parameters for this Move Face feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of six doubles (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks: The first three doubles returned are the X, Y, and Z rotation origin parameters. The remaining three doubles returned are the X, Y, and Z rotation angle parameters.
